legacy.full_text: China on Friday launched this year's negotiations on medicines to be covered by the national medical insurance system, with 168 drugs having entered the bidding process, according to the National Healthcare Security Administration. https://t.co/x5ndS5hhMj

legacy.full_text: Chinese scientists unveiled a newly developed lithium battery that can work in extreme cold and heat during the ongoing China Hi-Tech Fair. The battery can work in a minimum temperature as low as minus 70°C and can also function in heat up to a maximum of 80°C. https://t.co/7UmTWOdRrl

legacy.full_text: The planned crewed lunar missions worldwide have inspired a new wave of research in growing plants on the moon. Chinese researchers found that 3 species of bacteria could increase the amount of phosphorus content in the lunar soil simulant. (Journal Communications Biology) https://t.co/mn8zyRjffD

legacy.full_text: A China-developed Earth system simulation model, CAS-ESM2.0, designed to study climate change and provide help for disaster prevention and mitigation, was issued on Friday. It is the country's #first home-grown Earth system model. https://t.co/1oLba5VXXh

legacy.full_text: China's homegrown latest-generation offshore #WindPower installation platform, Huaxi 1600, was delivered Thur in E China's Qingdao. The 136-m-long and 50-m-wide self-propelled jack-up platform weighs 1,600t and is by far the most versatile & efficient of its kind. #MadeinChina https://t.co/6uAfbMIb0Q

legacy.full_text: China's 1st high-power #electric shunting locomotive rolled off the production line Thur in Zhuzhou, C China's Hunan. With a maximum towing power of 1,500 kW, this #locomotive designed for industrial users can travel 128 km while hauling 1,200 tonnes of cargo on a full charge. https://t.co/9XzYFJg4WY

legacy.full_text: #Robot's fingertip feel: A Chinese team developed a highly sensitive robotic sensory system for texture recognition. The system having the sensitivity of human fingers can identify 20 kinds of textiles with an average 98.9% accuracy, helping enhance the perceptibility of robots. https://t.co/Rx8K4jxUoJ

legacy.full_text: China, now boasting a wetland area of 56.35 mln ha, has initially established a national #wetland protection system covering 82 wetlands of international importance, 58 wetlands of national importance, 903 national wetland parks, and 13 international wetland cities: latest data https://t.co/vfkHrrHJ5W

legacy.full_text: China's Large High Altitude Air Shower Observatory (LHAASO), a high-altitude cosmic ray observatory, has released the precise energy spectrum for the highest-energy gamma-ray radiation from the brightest gamma-ray burst (GRB) observed to date. (Journal Science Advances) https://t.co/cUW3W9qhpn

legacy.full_text: China has selected 15 cities, including Beijing and Shenzhen, as pilot locations to expand the coverage of new energy vehicles for public services. Some 700,000 charging stations and 7,800 battery swapping stations will be built in these cities, a plan released this week said. https://t.co/SkmxtnIzve

legacy.full_text: A Chinese research team has developed a strain of oil-rich rice using gene-editing, opening up the oil-producing potential of starch-based grain crops ranging from rice to corn and potato, according to an article published in the journal Plant Communications. https://t.co/gejMajm9ES

legacy.full_text: China's northernmost #nuclear power station, Xudapu Nuclear Power Plant in northeast China's Liaoning, kicked off the construction of its No.1 unit's nuclear island on Wednesday. The 1,291-MW unit is expected to start operation in 2028. https://t.co/JzilRKiVLR

legacy.full_text: China on Thursday successfully launched a Long March-2C rocket from the Jiuquan Satellite Launch Center in northwest China, sending China's new-generation #ocean observation #satellite HY-3 01 into orbit. The launch was the 497th mission by the Long March rocket series. https://t.co/RZgeuUjFTP

legacy.full_text: Research icebreaker Xuelong of China's 40th Antarctic scientific expedition completed its first phase of navigation as it docked at a port in Australia Wed for necessity replenishment. It will carry on its journey to China's research base Zhongshan Station in #Antarctica on Fri. https://t.co/tIXibO64CX

legacy.full_text: The first 1-million-kW-level offshore #windpower project in S China's #GreaterBayArea was officially connected to the grid recently in Guangdong. The project can generate 3 billion kWh of clean electricity and reduce CO2 emissions by 2.35 million tonnes per year upon completion. https://t.co/NZokUKRv9j

legacy.full_text: Chinese&Italian scientists found GRB 221009A, the brightest gamma-ray burst ever detected, had caused major upper ionospheric electric field perturbation at 500km above the ground. The GRB was detected by telescopes from Earth & space incl China's LHAASO & satellite Insight-HXMT. https://t.co/fWLM194yHK
